body_html:
It looks like the 940M is compute capability 5.0 -- we default to only building for 3.5 and 5.2.

You might want to try building from sources. See the section here on installing for Cuda 3.0 to see how you can compile for Cuda 5.0.

@zheng-xq: Is

tensorflow/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc

Line 683 in 8048088

if (device_capability < min_supported_capability) {
properly capturing this? We probably want to just iterate over all compute capabilities and check for equality, unless I'm misunderstanding how compute capabilities work :)

It looks like the 940M is compute capability 5.0 -- we default to only building for 3.5 and 5.2.
You might want to try building from sources.  See the section here on installing for Cuda 3.0 to see how you can compile for Cuda 5.0.

 properly capturing this?  We probably want to just iterate over all compute capabilities and check for equality, unless I'm misunderstanding how compute capabilities work :)
